NewsDetail.Name: 05-15-12 Cosby third show
NewsDetail.Title: Bill Cosby adds third show
NewsDetail.Abstract: Because of popular demand, a third show by comedian Bill Cosby will be held on Wednesday, June 6, at 7:30 p.m. in the Hart Auditorium. Tickets will only be available for students and employees for the first two days of sales.
NewsDetail.Author: Don Sparhawk
NewsDetail.BodyCopy:
Because of popular demand, a third show by comedian Bill Cosby will be held at Brigham Young University-Idaho on Wednesday, June 6, at 7:30 p.m. in the Hart Auditorium.

Tickets for the third show will only be available to BYU-Idaho students and employees on the first two days of ticket sales. The tickets will go on sale at 8:15 a.m. on Monday, May 21, and be limited to only two per person on the first two days of sales. If there are still tickets left, they will be made available to the general public on Thursday morning at 8:15 a.m.

Don Sparhawk, coordinator for the Center Stage Performing Arts Series, said the university requested a special third show after many students were unable to get tickets.

Because of the high volume of tickets sales that are expected, already-purchased tickets for the June 7 and 8 performances may not be exchanged for tickets on the June 6 date.

Tickets for the show are $40 for premium seats. Other seats are $15 for BYU-Idaho students and employees, and $25 for the general public. Tickets will be available online at www.byui.edu/tickets or at the BYU-Idaho Ticket Office.
